message:
Score: 1.0
Reasoning: The solution correctly finds the minimum k by checking prefix sums of the k largest sweetnesses and k largest saltinesses; if either exceeds its threshold that k is achievable. The logic covers all cases (strict > checks, N fallback) and handles constraints, so it will pass all tests.
